description:
Integrate Github's notifications within the gnome desktop environment
Source code is available here: https://github.com/jrodna/gnome-github-notifications, forked from @alexduf's original extension and based on @KSXGitHub's upgrade to gnome 45, check out https://extensions.gnome.org/extension/1125/github-notifications/ for the older versions
name: Github Notifications for Gnome 46
